title: KONUS - KonusPro 7260 - 2X-7X32mm Riflescope With Engraved 30/30 Reticle  Black
features: SHORT TO MEDIUM RANGE: The fairly low magnification range on the KonusPro 2X-7X32 makes it ideal for use with .22 calibers, and a great choice for short to medium ranges and fast moving targets.
HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS: The KonusPro 2X-7X32mm has an unbreakable glass engraved 30/30 (duplex style) reticle.
PARALLAX: The parallax of the KonusPro 2X-7x32mm is corrected to 75 yards.
ENHANCED OPTICS: The multi-coated optics provide enhanced light transmission. Finger-adjustable turrets are easily dialed in, even with gloved hands.
NITROGEN PURGED: As with all Konus scopes, they are nitrogen purged for true waterproof and fogproof integrity, as well as being shockproof.
description: Specs - Waterproof, Fogproof, Shockproof - Dry Nitrogen Filled - Approved For Airguns With A 7.5 Joule Energy Or Less - Heavy Caliber Recoil Proof Reticle - Multi-coated Optics - Finger Adjustable Windage And Elevation Adjustments - Includes ring mounts suitable for ⅜” grooved receivers (ie: .22’s) - Includes Lens Caps And Lens Cleaning Cloth

Technical Data:: *Power/Objective Lens: 2x-7x32mm *Power/Objective Lens: 2X-7X32mm *Tube Diameter: 1" *Reticle: 30/30 Engraved Reticle *Finish: Matte *Exit Pupil: 8mm at 2x • 4mm at 7x *Eye Relief: 3"/76mm *F.O.V. at 100 yards: 43ft/14.3m at 2x • 12.6ft/4.2m at 7x *Length: 12" - 305mm *Weight: 14.1oz - 399gr *Click Value at 100 Yards: 1/2 M.O.A. (14mm) *Max Internal Adjustment: 69" - 1.6m *Parallax Setting: 75 Yards *Mounting Length: 4.9"/125mm
